User.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pictures WHERE hashid={0} orderpic={1}
INSERT INTO users (name, surname, hashid, birthday, password, age, mobilephone, extension, genre) VALUES('{0}','{1}','{2}','{3}','{4}', extract ( year from age(timestamp '{5}')),{6}, {7},'{8}')
select * from users u where hashid = '{0}'
select * from users where mobilephone = {0} and password  = '{1}'

Match.query: SELECT name, surname, age, description FROM users WHERE id !={0} and genre = '{1}' and interested = {2} and disco = {3} and id not in ( SELECT userLike from likes where userOrigin = {4} union select userLike from matches where userorigin= {5} union select userlike from dislikes where userorigin={6} ) limit 20 offset {7}

Disco.query: SELECT id, name, location, Street, City FROM discos limit {0} offset {1}
